languages.text: {n}Вокс-динамики на броне древнего чудовища издают душераздирающий вопль, переходящий в нечестивое бормотание сонма голосов:{/n} "Кровь ложноверующих собери в чашу, убогие устремления их пожни, скорбь их испей, и смех Истинных богов прогремит в слухе твоем".

{n}The vox-speakers on the ancient monster's armour emit a blood-curdling screech that turns into the unholy murmurs of countless voices:{/n} "Collect the blood of the false believers in a cup, reap of their pitiful strivings, drink of their sorrow, and the laughter of the True Gods will thunder in your ears."
languages.original_text: {n}Вокс-динамики на броне древнего чудовища издают душераздирающий вопль, переходящий в нечестивое бормотание сонма голосов:{/n} "Кровь ложноверующих собери в чашу, убогие устремления их пожни, скорбь их испей, и смех Истинных богов прогремит в слухе твоем".

traits.speaker: HellBrute_UlfarQuest

traits.locale_text: {n}The vox-speakers on the ancient monster's armour emit a blood-curdling screech that turns into the unholy murmurs of countless voices:{/n} "Collect the blood of the false believers in a cup, reap of their pitiful strivings, drink of their sorrow, and the laughter of the True Gods will thunder in your ears."
traits.speaker: HellBrute_UlfarQuest

languages.text: {n}这只远古怪物盔甲上的音阵装置发出了令人头痛欲裂的尖锐叫声，随后又变成了无数邪恶声音的窃窃私语。{/n}“将背信者的鲜血倒入杯中，结束他们可悲的挣扎，饱饮他们的伤痛，真神的笑声即会在你耳边响起。”
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-speakers on the ancient monster's armour emit a blood-curdling screech that turns into the unholy murmurs of countless voices:{/n} "Collect the blood of the false believers in a cup, reap of their pitiful strivings, drink of their sorrow, and the laughter of the True Gods will thunder in your ears."

traits.locale_text: {n}这只远古怪物盔甲上的音阵装置发出了令人头痛欲裂的尖锐叫声，随后又变成了无数邪恶声音的窃窃私语。{/n}“将背信者的鲜血倒入杯中，结束他们可悲的挣扎，饱饮他们的伤痛，真神的笑声即会在你耳边响起。”
traits.speaker: HellBrute_UlfarQuest

languages.text: {n}古代の怪物のアーマーに付属したヴォクス・スピーカーから、身の毛もよだつ悲鳴が聞こえたが、やがて無数の声が悪魔的な内容をつぶやく。{/n}「不敬をはたらく者の血を杯に集めよ、哀れな抵抗を刈り取り、嘆きを飲み干せ。さすれば真の神は、この耳元で笑い声を響かせん」
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-speakers on the ancient monster's armour emit a blood-curdling screech that turns into the unholy murmurs of countless voices:{/n} "Collect the blood of the false believers in a cup, reap of their pitiful strivings, drink of their sorrow, and the laughter of the True Gods will thunder in your ears."

traits.locale_text: {n}古代の怪物のアーマーに付属したヴォクス・スピーカーから、身の毛もよだつ悲鳴が聞こえたが、やがて無数の声が悪魔的な内容をつぶやく。{/n}「不敬をはたらく者の血を杯に集めよ、哀れな抵抗を刈り取り、嘆きを飲み干せ。さすれば真の神は、この耳元で笑い声を響かせん」
traits.speaker: HellBrute_UlfarQuest

languages.text: {n}Los altavoces del voco que incorpora la armadura del monstruo ancestral emiten un chirrido que hiela la sangre y que se convierte en los impíos murmullos de una salva de voces:{/n} «Recaba la sangre de los falsos creyentes en una copa, fruto de sus penosos esfuerzos, bebe de su dolor y la risa de los Dioses Verdaderos resonará en tus oídos».
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-speakers on the ancient monster's armour emit a blood-curdling screech that turns into the unholy murmurs of countless voices:{/n} "Collect the blood of the false believers in a cup, reap of their pitiful strivings, drink of their sorrow, and the laughter of the True Gods will thunder in your ears."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los altavoces del voco que incorpora la armadura del monstruo ancestral emiten un chirrido que hiela la sangre y que se convierte en los impíos murmullos de una salva de voces:{/n} «Recaba la sangre de los falsos creyentes en una copa, fruto de sus penosos esfuerzos, bebe de su dolor y la risa de los Dioses Verdaderos resonará en tus oídos».
traits.speaker: HellBrute_UlfarQuest

languages.text: {n}Les synthétiseurs-vox fixés sur l'armure du monstre crachent un son à glacer le sang qui se transforme en murmures d'innombrables voix impies :{/n} « Recueillez le sang des faux croyants dans une coupe, fauchez leurs pitoyables espoirs, buvez leur chagrin et le rire des vrais dieux tonnera à vos oreilles. »
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-speakers on the ancient monster's armour emit a blood-curdling screech that turns into the unholy murmurs of countless voices:{/n} "Collect the blood of the false believers in a cup, reap of their pitiful strivings, drink of their sorrow, and the laughter of the True Gods will thunder in your ears."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les haut-parleurs fixés sur l'armure du monstre crachent un son à glacer le sang qui se transforme en murmures d'innombrables voix impies :{/n} « Recueillez le sang des faux croyants dans une coupe, fauchez leurs pitoyables espoirs, buvez leur chagrin et le rire des vrais dieux tonnera à vos oreilles. »
traits.speaker: HellBrute_UlfarQuest

languages.text: {n}Die Vox-Lautsprecher an der Panzerung des alten Monsters geben eine Rede wieder, die das Blut erstarren lässt und sich in das unheilige Gemurmel zahlloser Stimmen verwandelt:{/n} "Sammelt das Blut der falschen Gläubigen in einer Tasse, erntet ihre jämmerlichen Bemühungen und trinkt ihre Trauer, dann wird das Gelächter der wahren Götter in Euren Ohren donnern."
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-speakers on the ancient monster's armour emit a blood-curdling screech that turns into the unholy murmurs of countless voices:{/n} "Collect the blood of the false believers in a cup, reap of their pitiful strivings, drink of their sorrow, and the laughter of the True Gods will thunder in your ears."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Vox-Lautsprecher an der Panzerung des alten Monsters geben eine Rede wieder, die das Blut erstarren lässt und sich in das unheilige Gemurmel zahlloser Stimmen verwandelt:{/n} "Sammelt das Blut der falschen Gläubigen in einer Tasse, erntet ihre jämmerlichen Bemühungen und trinkt ihre Trauer, dann wird das Gelächter der wahren Götter in Euren Ohren donnern."
traits.speaker: HellBrute_UlfarQuest

languages.text: {n}Kadim canavarın zırhındaki voks hoparlörü; sayısız sesin uğursuz mırıltısına dönüşen, kan donduran bir feryat yayınlıyor.{/n} "Sapkınların kanını bir kaba doldurun, zavallı mücadelelerini toplayın, acılarını yudumlayın. İşte o zaman Gerçek Tanrıların kahkahası, kulaklarınızda çınlayacaktır."
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-speakers on the ancient monster's armour emit a blood-curdling screech that turns into the unholy murmurs of countless voices:{/n} "Collect the blood of the false believers in a cup, reap of their pitiful strivings, drink of their sorrow, and the laughter of the True Gods will thunder in your ears."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kadim canavarın zırhındaki voks hoparlörü, sayısız sesin uğursuz mırıltısına dönüşen, kan donduran bir feryadı yayınlıyor:{/n} "Sapkınların kanını bir kaba doldurun, zavallı mücadelelerini toplayın, acılarını yudumlayın. İşte o zaman Gerçek Tanrıların kahkahası kulaklarınızda çınlayacaktır."
traits.speaker: HellBrute_UlfarQuest
